llmguidance 0.0.1
  • Reference

    This repository provides a concept of a Shiny application to explore use of LLMs to provide guidance on packages and documentation. See the discussion board for more information on the concept, as well as the issues page for current design ideas.

    Installation

    You can run a local version of the Shiny app (stored as app.R) with the following code:

    library(shiny); library(rsconnect)
setwd("~/Documents/GitHub/epiverse-trace/llm-guidance/demo/package_app/")
runApp()

    You will need an OpenAI API account to run the app. The app sources your stored local credentials from data/credentials.csv, where the value column defines the API key.

    Example

    The scripts/generate_doc_embeddings.R script runs LLM embeddings for local repositories (currently this points to: ~/Documents/GitHub/epiverse-trace/ ).

    Development

    Lifecycle

    This package is currently a concept, as defined by the RECON software lifecycle. This means that essential features and mechanisms are still being developed, and the package is not ready for use outside of the development team.

    Contributions

    Contributions are welcome via pull requests.

    Code of Conduct

    Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
